summary: Mid-Columbia Gymnastics Academy - Mid-Columbia Gymnastics Academy provides high quality gymnastics and tumbling to children starting at age 8 months through 18 years with nearly 200 classes offered- beginning to advanced! We have the largest facility in the area and have been teaching kids gymnastics since 1986! At any age or gender your child will be taught in a positive and fun environment. We realize that nobody’s goals are identical but we believe that gymnastics can be used to promote good physical fitness, leadership, and confidence. We offer a ton of special activities that include Birthday Parties, Summer Camps, Indoor Playgrounds, Open Gyms, Clinics, Field Trips, & More!
